about_the_game:
You’ve played the game, you’ve smashed the balls, you’ve explored the worlds. But have you listened to the music? The Bang-On Balls soundtrack is a musical masterpiece that will take you on a sonic adventure through time and space. From the ancient Norse sagas to the modern cyberpunk dystopia, from the cosmic disco to the pirate rock, this soundtrack has it all.
Enjoy 40 original tracks composed by Łukasz Salomon Bryła and Matthew Chilleli - Two talented musicians who have poured their hearts and souls into creating a musical experience that matches the game’s humor and charm.

There’s no time to waste. Get the Bang-On Balls: Chronicles soundtrack today!
